Description: Green glazed composition integral finger-ring, bezel inscribed with the name and epithets of Amun-Ra.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1993-2003, Newcastle, The Hancock Museum, Land of the Pharaohs 2006/8 Sept-Sept, Wallsend, Segedunum Roman Fort & Baths Museum, Egypt Revealed
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
